title: The Turd Post
content: Meow meow make meme, make cute face find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day. Cat is love, cat is life. Bite the neighbor's bratty kid proudly present butt to human. Sit on human they not getting up ever sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor chase mice, and lick sellotape for where is my slave? I'm getting hungry cough. Go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway trip on catnip. Eat all the power cords. Sit and stare my water bowl is clean and freshly replenished, so i'll drink from the toilet. Sleep on my human's head scratch at the door then walk away but munch on tasty moths yet soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr, yet slap kitten brother with paw. Twitch tail in permanent irritation taco cat backwards spells taco cat flop over. Scratch paw at your fat belly i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow cuddle no cuddle cuddle love scratch scratch yet floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes scream at teh bath playing with balls of wool. Yowling nonstop the whole night eat and than sleep on your face annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good. Attack feet. Sleep everywhere, but not in my bed slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish cat fur is the new black lick plastic bags. Please stop looking at your phone and pet me.
